document.full_text: doc rivers has agreed to a fresh five-year deal to remain head coach of the boston celtics and take the franchise into a new era, the nba team said on friday.
document.title: celtics coach rivers accepts new five-year deal
lines_and_colors: doc rivers has agreed to a fresh five-year deal to remain head coach of the boston celtics and take the franchise into a new era, the nba team said on friday.
